org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.loginmodules.password.authenticators.jdbc.propsbuilder

Class JaasBasedConnPropsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.loginmodules.password.authenticators.jdbc.propsbuilder.JaasBasedConnPropsBuilder

  • public final class JaasBasedConnPropsBuilder
extends Object
    This class builds a set of ConnectionProperties using the settings obtained from a JAAS Properties Map.

    Use the keys from the various KEY_* fields to properly populate the JAAS Properties Map before calling this class' methods. Otherwise, the defaults from MapBasedConnPropsBuilder will be used.

    • Method Detail

      • buildDefault

        public static org.beiter.michael.db.ConnectionProperties buildDefault()
        Creates a set of connection properties that use the defaults as specified in this class.
        Returns:
        A set of connection properties with (reasonable) defaults
        See Also:
        JaasBasedConnPropsBuilder

      • build

        public static org.beiter.michael.db.ConnectionProperties build(Map<String,?> properties)
        Initialize a set of connection properties based on key / values in a HashMap.
        Parameters:
        properties - A HashMap with configuration properties as required by the init() method in JAAS, using the keys as specified in this class
        Returns:
        A ConnectionProperties object with default values, plus the provided parameters
